pr_title: remove noisy class path element from status logger

timeline.message: remove noisy class path element from status logger, only log it at debug level

timeline.bodyText: This doesn't include it in the JSON... Not sure if that matters.
timeline.author: tylerbenson

replies.bodyText: No, it doesn't, and I made the change based on the assumption that it doesn't matter.
replies.author: richardstartin
